name: Hillshire Farm Lit'l Smokies® French Toast Bites
author: Hillshire Farm(R) Brand
summary: A fun new way to serve French toast and smoked sausage for a crowd-pleasing brunch.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package Hillshire Farm Lit'l Smokies® Smoked Sausage
¼ cup maple syrup, plus extra for brushing
directions: Saute smoked sausages in a skillet over medium heat until browned
Cut French toast into 1-inch wide pieces
Spread a little maple syrup on each piece of toast then sandwich one smoked sausage between two pieces of toast and seal together with a toothpick
Mix 1/4 cup maple syrup and Dijon mustard in a small bowl and serve alongside French toast bites
Sprinkle with confectioners' sugar before serving
